description: Singular n X n matrices over GF(3).
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,45
maple: for n from 1 to 20 do printf(`%d,`,3^(n^2) - product(3^n - 3^j, j=0..n-1)) od:
prog: (PARI) { for (n=1, 45, write("b060705.txt", n, " ", 3^(n^2) - prod(j=0, n-1, 3^n - 3^j)); ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 09 2009]
author: Ahmed Fares (ahmedfares(AT)my-deja.com), Apr 20 2001
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Apr 23 2001
